NewsItem.HEADLINE: Open RAN 2019
NewsItem.SUMMARY: A review of Open RAN initiatives and standards with an assessment of future procurement.
NewsItem.NEWSLINETEXT: The five-year forecast predicts how widespread the use of eCPRI and ORAN standards will be in RU-DU interfaces and in actual procurement by operators.
NewsItem.KEYWORDS: ORAN xRAN eCPRI TIP RU DU CU RRH BBU forecast
NewsItem.ATTACHMENT: MEXP-ORAN-19 REV0 ericsson.pdf, MEXP-ORAN-19 rev0 ericsson.xlsx,
